languages.text: Ксенос Злоба обещает свою помощь Вольному Торговцу в обмен на смерть своего врага — человека по прозвищу Комиссар, скрывающегося в Увечном секторе Темного города.
The xenos called Malice promised to aid the Rogue Trader in exchange for killing his enemy — a man named the Commissar hiding in the Mangled Sector of the Dark City.
languages.original_text: Ксенос Злоба обещает свою помощь Вольному Торговцу в обмен на смерть своего врага — человека по прозвищу Комиссар, скрывающегося в Увечном секторе Темного города.

traits.locale_text: The xenos called Malice promised to aid the Rogue Trader in exchange for killing his enemy — a man named the Commissar hiding in the Mangled Sector of the Dark City.
The xenos called Malice promised to aid the Rogue Trader in exchange for killing his enemy — a man named the Commissar hiding in the Mangled Sector of the Dark City.
The xenos called Malice promised to aid the Rogue Trader in exchange for killing his enemy — a man named the Commissar hiding in the Mangled Sector of the Dark City.

languages.text: Le xénos appelé Malice a promis d'aider {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} si {mf|celui-ci|celle-ci} tuait son ennemi : un homme appelé le commissaire qui se cache dans le Secteur condamné de la Cité Crépusculaire.
languages.original_text: The xenos called Malice promised to aid the Rogue Trader in exchange for killing his enemy — a man named the Commissar hiding in the Mangled Sector of the Dark City.

traits.locale_text: Le xénos appelé Malice a promis d'aider {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} si {mf|celui-ci|celle-ci} tuait son ennemi : un homme appelé le commissaire qui se cache dans le Secteur condamné de la Cité Crépusculaire.

languages.text: 一个名为“恶棍”的异形答应协助行商浪人，但前提是，行商浪人必须杀死他的敌人“政委”。政委此刻正躲在黑暗之城的崩落区。
languages.original_text: The xenos called Malice promised to aid the Rogue Trader in exchange for killing his enemy — a man named the Commissar hiding in the Mangled Sector of the Dark City.

traits.locale_text: 一个名为“恶棍”的异形答应协助行商浪人，但前提是，行商浪人必须杀死他的敌人“政委”。政委此刻正躲在黑暗之城的崩落区。

languages.text: マリスと呼ばれる異種族は自身の敵 — 仄暗き都の切り裂かれた星域に潜むコミッサーと名乗る男の殺害と引き換えに、自由開拓者を助けると約束した。
languages.original_text: The xenos called Malice promised to aid the Rogue Trader in exchange for killing his enemy — a man named the Commissar hiding in the Mangled Sector of the Dark City.

traits.locale_text: マリスと呼ばれる異種族は自身の敵 — 仄暗き都の切り裂かれた星域に潜むコミッサーと名乗る男の殺害と引き換えに、自由開拓者を助けると約束した。

languages.text: Der Xenos namens Tücke hat versprochen, {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} zu helfen, wenn {mf|dieser|diese} seinen Feind tötet — einen Mann, der sich "der Kommissar" nennt und sich im Zerfleischten Sektor der Dunklen Stadt versteckt.
languages.original_text: The xenos called Malice promised to aid the Rogue Trader in exchange for killing his enemy — a man named the Commissar hiding in the Mangled Sector of the Dark City.

traits.locale_text: Der Xenos namens Tücke hat versprochen, {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} zu helfen, wenn {mf|dieser|diese} seinen Feind tötet — einen Mann, der sich "der Kommissar" nennt und sich im Zerfleischten Sektor der Dunklen Stadt versteckt.

languages.text: El xenos llamado Malicia promete ayudar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente a cambio de que mate a su enemigo, un hombre llamado el comisario. Se oculta en el Sector Destrozado de la Ciudad Siniestra.
languages.original_text: The xenos called Malice promised to aid the Rogue Trader in exchange for killing his enemy — a man named the Commissar hiding in the Mangled Sector of the Dark City.

traits.locale_text: El xenos llamado Malicia promete ayudar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente a cambio de que mate a su enemigo, un hombre llamado el comisario. Se oculta en el Sector Destrozado de la Ciudad Siniestra.

languages.text: Melanet denen zeno, Kara Şehir'in Biçimsiz Sektör kısmında saklanan Komiser adındaki düşmanını öldürmesi karşılığında Hür Tacir'e yardım edeceğine söz verdi.
languages.original_text: The xenos called Malice promised to aid the Rogue Trader in exchange for killing his enemy — a man named the Commissar hiding in the Mangled Sector of the Dark City.
